Reviews.Title: very good product
Reviews.Author: frank martinez
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Uniden UDR-444 for home application, installation was easy kind of DYI,  I took just 25 minutes,The system worked perfectly, intercom is a plus, image quality is selectable, I preferred HD, zoon is ok but not great, night vision work well. The price is competitive. I have not complaint.

Reviews.Title: Great starter dvr system.  Well worth the price
Reviews.Author: George Hayduke
Reviews.Content: I like the intercom, and live mic's on the camera's.  Image is slightly grainy. Very acceptable and easily recognize a face.  Zoom on camera is not centered in unzoomed frame.  It is high and left.  Wireless range is somewhat lacking, and a steel sided house or shop will drop reception to 20 ft or less. Battery loses it's charge more quickly than I would have thought.  Unit is kind of difficult to get into the power dock. None of these issues strike me as unacceptable for this price. They seem like normal issues experienced with a less than high end unit.Overall I feel that this is a great unit with good features.  The price is very reasonable. Best unit I could find for the price.  I enjoy the portable monitor. I now consider this a must have. Fits easily in your pocket.  Super easy to install and setup.  I would buy again.  Easy to use.  Super easy to aim camera's with the portable monitor. That alone is worth buying this unit. Night vision is acceptable.  Easy to view on computer, tv, monitor ect.  Comes with all cables.  I built small rain shelters for my camera's out of old milk jugs. It actually helps hide the camera, protect it outdoors, and keeps the lens dry. I have experienced no problems due to outdoor mounting of camera's.I was leary of buying with all the bad reviews.  Took a chance, and am pleasantly surprised. Just make sure you use the correct power adapter for the monitor when you test it out for the first time. Great wireless dvr system

Reviews.Title: Great system.
Reviews.Author: Margaret Clouden
Reviews.Content: Memory card went bad within the first week and was not enough space.  Should come with better card and highest space micro card available because I had to buy another one because the company did not have replacements available.  Of course I bought the highest space micro card available which allowed me a week of recording without deleting.

Reviews.Title: Easy to follow review
Reviews.Author: Joe Cool
Reviews.Content: The monitor is easy to use. it explains itself without the manual through a good basic user interface. recording will only function when the sd card is inserted, and the monitor is NOT plugged into your computer. if the computer or mobile function is used it will not record. also, it will only record the screen being used. if it is quad view set, that will record. if it is single camera, that will record.PC functions are very poorly laid out in the instructions. the installation is a breeze, however, there is no included program to view the cameras from. the computer imply recognizes a live cam is attached and you use it much the same way you would any plug n play webcam. that being said the skype accessibility is well explained and functions as advertised.the functionality for coming right out of the box is again as advertised. however for recording, and more often viewing recordings, my monitor thus far has been freezing up more than a few times. also my computer has what seems like a personal issue with the file format, although it could be my software and will update this late if applicable.through walls and distance in my modest size place, it has had no connection issues, and has functioned more or less as advertised. it isnt top of the line. is for people who need something. not need to watch every corner and record every minute. but to have that something, those extra eyes. it works great.

Reviews.Title: Good Video Quality, but remote view is not good.
Reviews.Author: Cristian F.
Reviews.Content: I Bought this item from Zorotools.I can tell it is a good/fair bundle for the price, nice wireless video quality.Good MonitorNight view is really 40 feet and very good quality.The bad:You can just watch one camera through skype.There is no firmware and an app in order to connect remotely and watch all the cameras (without skype)If you want this for remote viewing different cameras, consider something else.

Reviews.Title: Great video and pictures
Reviews.Author: James k Bohannon
Reviews.Content: Easily to install  Like the fact I do not have to be home to watch or check things when I am not home

Reviews.Title: uniden G455
Reviews.Author: gary
Reviews.Content: I have the G455. It works great and was easy to get started. Works perfect on my smartphone. Only thing i have experienced is that the power cord no longer works for one of the cameras and I am having a hard time trying to get just the power cord. Radio Shack has a universal power cord for $40.00. Other than the power cord, system works great.

Reviews.Title: UDR444 Pretty good system
Reviews.Author: Mr T
Reviews.Content: No problems, no complaints. Lots of "plus" features; ie: 32 gb capable, portable operation, highly waterproof, ease of set-up and use, etc. Manual is good but doesn't explain how some things work.  Unit requires experimentation to determine some aspects of how it operates. I am pretty pleased. I've installed two sets (4 units with a spare monitor).

Reviews.Title: Two thumbs up !!!
Reviews.Author: Joe Sanchez
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and works AWESOME!!! I love not having to drop what I'm doing to rush and answer the door. Great during early mornings - don't have to get out of bed to see who's knocking. I haven't had any issues with this unit and I LOVE IT !!!

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: Item was delivered on time, when I opened the box everything was there that you need. Setup was easy, hardest part was putting screws in. Picture is great, but I should have bought a bigger monitor. I would highly recommend this product. I am thinking about another camera. This is a great product for the price. Get one before they raise the price, again I recommend this item and the company...

Reviews.Title: Perfect for average everyday joe
Reviews.Author: Buckaloo
Reviews.Content: I've installed very complex expensive DVR based camera security systems for doctors offices, pharmacies and even residential locations. I wasn't sure what to expect with this system. WOW! That's all I can say. Is it perfect NO NOTHING is not will be. But this system will work for most people. The video is ok. The audio is amazing. The thing pick up my neighbors talking at over 50 yards away. The intercom system is nice my wife used it to find the kids and tell them to come in or what ever. On the setting where it rotates cameras in the screen. If you set it to that and set motion record to low it will get any human and nothing else and auto record which camera they set off. This does record video. If your menu freezes up it's the recording press the back button and replay or delete it. All in all for what it is this thing deserves 6 stars. I didn't even mention the portable DVR monitor which is awesome. Don't hesitate and buy two extra cameras. You will be glad you did.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Zel
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a camera system that we didn't need wifi or internet for..  We were skeptical at how this camera would work for the locations we needed it for.. We did make a box to go around each camera for extra protection.. The camera and software was a breeze to hook up. Just plug in and go.. Different levels of motion sensor and the availibility to schedule recordings for certain times works perfectly.... I was honestly expecting to have a fuzzy or not so great vision and it's been crystal clear.. Can make out who's in the picture/video perfectly . The night vision is clear as well and an added plus..

Reviews.Title: Perfect solution to my security needs.
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: Exceptional functionality and features, particularly for the price.  This is exactly what I needed to monitor my detached garage from the inside, and my backyard.  Motion detection works great.  Clarity of recorded video is easily enough to clearly see facial features.  I'm recording on the included 4 GB micro SD card with the resolution set to high.  Camera will also record audio.  The intercom feature is a nice touch.  I'll be buying two more cameras to record the driveway and people at the front door.  This setup is better than I expected!

Reviews.Title: pretty good system.
Reviews.Author: fullmanido
Reviews.Content: Purchased this item for piece of mind around the house, caught hooligans (neighbors-surprise) dumping cleaners and chemicals into our trash bins. Also noticed skunks parading around my vehicles. Cons: can not make the skype work just yet, overall the system performs and is very easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: SS
Reviews.Content: Easy to install, and works well. Just wish it had a longer range between the cameras and the moniter. Good picture.

Reviews.Title: Easy Plug n Play!...good entry level security system!
Reviews.Author: G. Howard
Reviews.Content: So far a good system. It serves it's purpose. ONE thing DO NOT make the MISTAKE I made and buy the TWO FER system WITH the 32g SD card...Because the card they try to get you to buy along WITH the system is NOT a MICRO SD card which is what it needs to be...the try to sell you a standard size card...other than that the quality of the night vision is good, the speaker quality is good and over all it's an adequate DIY security system...

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: Easy setup and really works great.  Only wish it had a pan feature and the screen was larger.  Would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Sixta T. Hall
Reviews.Content: I selected 5 stars to this product, since performs greatly as indicated. The two cameras provide clear images in color during the day, and also a clear contrast while taking images in the night.  The monitor records neatly and has various choices of manual and automatic handling as well as moving sensor.  This product is a great addition to my piece of mind.  Works excellent.

Reviews.Title: affordable deterrent and home monitoring
Reviews.Author: Terry ben Yisrael
Reviews.Content: You will need a power drill to install.  Its has been great so far. The skype set up is a pain and I just never did it but its basic plug and play tech. The only issue is I think i reached a limit in my 32 gig card and it reads ass a error and will not record unless I out a new one in. Beaides that th3 nught vision is great and the motion detection is sensative. All weather use.

Reviews.Title: awsome product
Reviews.Author: really!
Reviews.Content: For the price and how easy it is to set up this is an awesome product, If you set this thing on auto record and set it too the 4 way view it zooms in on the camera and records the same one that went off so u can have a 4 way view with an alarm set up to zoom in on the camera automatically and rec at the same time with out doing anything but looking ;p

Reviews.Title: Barely Ok
Reviews.Author: Bruce S.
Reviews.Content: If you want to use this system in broad daylight or good lighting at relatively close ranges this may be the system for you. The setup is easy and getting a picture to show up on the monitor was no problem. As far as remote viewing, I tried on 3 different laptops running two different OS (Win 7 and 8) and could never get the monitor recognized in order to do the Skype set up so no remote monitoring for me. The other negative is the motion detection at night. While the night view is not bad and pretty clear on mine, anything short of large objects (Cars, trucks, etc)will not set off the motion detection no matter what sensitivity setting is used. In fact, while we were on vacation one of the batteries were stolen out of my boat located right under the camera and no video was recorded at all !  So overall, this system is not going to work for me to do actual security at my house..baby monitor, inside with good lighting, maybe..but I wouldn't depend on it for much more.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: Jack Ryan
Reviews.Content: The cameras are okay, BUT do not buy if you want to be able to view from your smart phone or another computer. Manual is a joke. BIG gaps in the instructions. I will return and get something else.

Reviews.Title: Wow, I can see why the nice reviews
Reviews.Author: TonyS "E. tech"
Reviews.Content: This is exactly what I really wanted. For the price this little guy can do the job. I ordered 2 additional cameras with this and have a 4 camera setup. Pairing the added cameras with channel 3 and 4 was EASY!. I had all four on the screen at once. I set the resolution to the max of 640 X 480 on each camera. For me it is just fine! If you want an HD Camera then pay the price. Otherwise this is a simple but very useful system.I first began by installing one camera on the garage ceiling and plugged it in to an AC outlet. Then installed one in my Sunroom in the back (Backdoor) and plugged it in.The other 2 our in the front entry and kitchen (For grins).The Motion Detection is fine if you want to use it but it is limited on distance. I am talking 30 feet before you really have to start dancing to make it record. I do use the motion detection.NOTE: I purchased a 32 GB Micro SD card instead of using the 4GB card that comes with it. If you want to record continuously at the highest resolution expect about 29 hours of record time with a 32GB Micro SD card before it either stops recording or starts to overwrite the oldest files (Settable). But for motion detection, which seemed to work great you will get more time away from it. It does display in real time but if you are set for motion detection it only records if it sees motion. So far so good. I will let you know how the cameras do as far as longevity. Worth the money for me and the display is well made!

Reviews.Title: Security
Reviews.Author: A. Saenz Jr. "Bettering self"
Reviews.Content: The best thing for home security. Best part about it its all preprogrammed cameras are paired recording times are set resolution is set intercom and system working great.  When in power saving mode once a camera is triggered the monitor lights up from sleep. I lost the 4gb micro sd card thou replaced with 16gb card. Great night vision am impressed with that. Only thing I should have bought 2 more cameras. Would recommend to anyone. Simple set up. Monitor could be bigger thou.

Reviews.Title: Uniden UDR444 Video Surveillance Camera
Reviews.Author: Linda J. Addison
Reviews.Content: Love these cameras.  Small and can be placed in tight places.  The monitor is clear and we love them. Will definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great Product For A Resonable Price
Reviews.Author: Robert Cepero
Reviews.Content: After reading some of the negative reviews on this product I was Leary of purchasing it. However, I am extremely happy with this unit and for the price, it is worth it. I was looking for a not so sophisticated wireless unit that I could use for my house. This was perfect for me. Easy to setup, use and the picture is of very good quality in my opinion. My only complaint is that the micro card that comes with the unit doesn't have enough memory. No problem, I just went out and purchased a larger memory micro card so I can record longer.I would highly recommend this system and I plan to add 2 more cameras to enhance my coverage.

Reviews.Title: Super easy to install, great value for the price, better than expected.
Reviews.Author: C. Halterman
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for peace of mind for our small farm.  We've had several break-ins to our storage sheds. We know who is doing it, but couldn't prove it until now.  We purchased an extra camera, also sold on amazon, and it paired very easily with this unit. The picture quality is excellent, even at night. We have chickens and other farm animals and we set the sensitivity to low where the chickens are usually congregated and that camera does not record their comings and goings. We are super impressed with this system.Also, as others have noted, there is a difference between the power cords.  Each cord is labeled "for camera use" or for "monitor use". We didn't notice that at first and made the mistake of using the wrong cord for the monitor. It worked great at first, but it wouldn't charge. We thought we had a bad monitor, but then I noticed the label on the power cord said "camera". Duh. I switched them out and it has worked perfect ever since.

Reviews.Title: Responding back about cameras
Reviews.Author: CASEY
Reviews.Content: One of camera doesn't work at night time but every thing else works great . Just that one camera really seems like it's had water damage

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: yukonn
Reviews.Content: This system is simple to setup. I didn't; want to setup 2 Skype accounts to get this over my phone. I am happy just recording anyone that tries to break in on me so I can then hunt them down.

Reviews.Title: More cons than pros but it's a system for a good price.
Reviews.Author: Dev
Reviews.Content: Cons: Unit can not handle it's own high quality video setting without the framerate dropping dramatically. Even in the low/grainy 320x240 camera setting the cameras often freeze for 7 seconds or more constantly causing you to miss important moments. Video quality is not really good enough for positive id of pedestrians in the low setting and this is worse at night.One of my cameras is probably 25 feet away from the monitor and the signal goes in and out constantly and the camera freezes up completely missing what is going on. The motion sensor function often starts capturing movements after it is too late and the objects are already out of the screen. The motion sensor recording seems to be triggered by random things like clouds passing over and sometimes there is no visible cause for the triggering. If you reduce the motion trigger sensitivity it only seems to capture motion for half the field of view. The motion sensor function does not work at night. The auto capture function zooms into the screen with movement and usually leaves all the other areas vulnerable for 15 seconds minimum until there is no movement in the active screen, sometimes it seems to jump to the camera sensing more activity and sometimes it doesn't. The continual recording breaks the video up into an unreasonable number of separate files (10 min files I think) but it seems to vary. The video does not seem to display the date and time for evidence purposes in split screen mode. The monitor has folder and battery icons that really get in the way of the top of the camera feed while in the 4 split cam view, this is especially terrible when your split view for each feed is an inch or so tall. Monitor feed can not be turned off in manual recording, this sucks at night if monitor is in your bedroom and still video feeds probably can't be good for the monitor's lifetime expectancy.Pros: Good price for a system. Micro SD recording is convenient. Auto motion capture is nice to have. Wireless is convenient and cameras are easy to install. Monitor is nice and portable. Audio and talk functions are a plus.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!!!
Reviews.Author: Luke Sliger
Reviews.Content: I work security at a nightclub, i ordered these for added security, they work very well, motion detection is solid. The colors are muted and dull, but for what i need thats not a problem. There are a couple issues i have, first being, if motion is detected on one camera it overrides the 4 split camera view, you cannot view all cameras simultaneously if motion is detected. The other is the fact that it cuts the auto record into 10 minute intervals, i would love if it was one solid file, but thats me and for my purposes. On occasion i notice signal lost for a moment, not more than 10-5 seconds, but all and all a solid security system for the money we spent. It does the job making sure things are going as planned.

Reviews.Title: great system
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: This camera was every thing i expected.I bought the refurbished and its like i bought brand new. Everything works great on this system. The range is great just about everything is great with this camera.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Mark Twain "Sam"
Reviews.Content: More features than I could ever ask for.  Easy to set up and even recommended one to my own father who promptly went out and bought one! However, one of the two camera's that came in the second package does not operate correctly.  Hopefully either Amazon, Domo, or Uniden will replace it.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Will not transmit through 1 wall
Reviews.Author: GCarroll
Reviews.Content: Returned item as it did not perform as advertised. Screen bounced when close. Did not check many other features after it did not transmit over a decent distance or through one sheet rock wall.

Reviews.Title: ABSOLUTE GARBAGE
Reviews.Author: Blaise24
Reviews.Content: Its unfortunate, amazon sells such TERRIBLE products. Amazon doesn't do anything to protect consumers from LOW QUALITY merchandise. As a result, i am starting to second guess ordering through amazon any further. This particular camera system, is the worst i have ever seen. I have had about 8 different security systems in the past. This Uniden system is by far the worst. Terrible picture, colors are off, The monitor blacked out within 2 hours of use, had to send it back and get another one. The new monitor sent to me was scratched, and  the brightness button does not work at all. Zoom is an absolute joke, Night vision is terrible, and one of my cameras IR does NOT work, which doesn't let me see in the dark, not that it matters at this point. Since i will be trashing this piece of garbage system. All the screws provided with the system are cheap as well, a LOW AMP drill will most definitely strip the screws, leaving your cameras stuck where they are, unless you cut the screws in half. UNIDEN, your PRODUCT is TERRIBLE. I will absolutely never PURCHASE a thing from you again, nor would i recommend to anybody. At this point, if i was given a free system from UNIDEN, i would still purchase another product before using the UNIDEN system. Such a shame that products like these, with such low quality do not have to meet any form of standards before being sold. Just like food is regulated, these products need to be as well..Thanks Uniden, For making Such garbage cameras that i now have to replace, with a better system. Thumbs down

Reviews.Title: paid for new but got was used item and 3 missing parts
Reviews.Author: Jesse rawls
Reviews.Content: Bought what I thought was new but the monitor looked like it had been handled, it was obviously used instead of the shiny plastic frame and glass monitor the plastic had small scratches and dull appearance and the gloss part of monitor was smudged and had obviously been handled, and it was missing the piece of clear plastic that goes on any and all pieces of equipment that has shiny glass or plastic as the main part of the item. This was bad enough but it was missing three parts of equipment that was shown in the manual. Amazon was able to get me one of the pieces but did not have the other to parts available (an av cable and a disc to load the drives to allow mobile devices to receive video using "Skype". Amazon did the best they could in this bad situation and refunded me a small amount of money in hopes of contacting the sellers and get or buy the items from them but they have no way besides this lousy way.

Reviews.Title: These Make AWESOME Baby Monitors
Reviews.Author: Lindy L.
Reviews.Content: We have had the UDW10003 http://www.amazon.com/Uniden-UDW10003-Wireless-Surveillance-Portable/dp/B002KFZSJQ For the past 4 years. Starting in our 1st Babies room and then adding a camera for our 2nd baby. We just recently finished off our basement decided to move the girls cameras down to their playroom and up grade to these cameras for their bedrooms.I am beyond pleased with these. They have great picture and sound quality. I am over the moon about the "Talk" feature which allows me to talk to them while they are in there rooms. This comes in VERY handy at nap time :) These are awesome and I would and will recommend them as Baby Monitors to everyone.

Reviews.Title: system lasted less than 30 days
Reviews.Author: P. McAnish
Reviews.Content: Setup was easy and my only complaint initially was the motion detector has limited range at night ( less than 15 feet)  It also does not overwrite when the SD card is full, you must manually reformat. But I had to return in when it just got stuck in the record mode and could not be reset. There is a manual record button but pushing it several times ( on & off) did not help. It finally just went blank. This is my second wireless surveillance system(other was different manufacturer}  to go bad in less than 30 days

Reviews.Title: WORTH IT!!!
Reviews.Author: Southlaw
Reviews.Content: the one overall problem I had with this product was the individual cameras do not come with a battery pack incase of a temporary power outage or power lost...if they had a rechargeable battery and ac connect for the wall...it would greatly improve this product to a premier piece of equipment...other than that...it works like a charm...and for the price, capabilities, with the specs reported...I feel they all matched or exceeded expectations on several levels...THIS IS WORTH EVERY PENNY AND THEN SOME!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: exactly what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: SumTingRight
Reviews.Content: Long story short, I have a neighbor that has gone crazy over a divorce and I didn't feel as secure as I would like to be. I searched and searched for several inexpensive security camera systems that wasn't a pain to install and I decided to go with this one. It is really simple to sync together. I ordered two extra camera's and you can sync up to four with this one. I set it to record by motion and it records for 30 seconds unless there is continuous motion, then it'll record longer. I had to drill a couple holes in my garage to plug in the power cord and filled in the holes with caulking after they were plugged in. They don't stick out and keep a low profile. I really like the portable monitor. It holds a charge for about 4-5 hours with power saving mode on. I have an extra docking station so I can charge it in the living room and my bedroom. It works really good. It came with an 8 gig mini SD card which is more then enough if you have it record on motion. The only thing I don't like about it is it'll only record one camera at a time. So if you have two things going on at the same time which ever set off the motion record first is the one being recorded. Other than that this system is perfect.

Reviews.Title: It'll do, but only just.
Reviews.Author: Me Too
Reviews.Content: Having issues with an harassing neighbor I bought this to continuously record my front yard so we have some evidence if she starts yelling at us again.For this purpose this system does the job.Here are my pro's and con's:Pro's:- decent day and night vision quality with good range.- decent microphone quality, it picks up a lot.- with several walls between the camera (I only set up one) and the DVR unit it still picks up the signal with sound at about 60 feet separation.- Good sensitivity on the motion detectors. I have played with that a bit and the camera would always start recording me right as I walk into its field of view.- The system worked "out of the box" which means that other then having to fine-tune the setup I had a picture pop up the second I plugged in the camera power.Con's:- The mounting feet are near useless. I had to use pliers to tighten them enough so the camera wouldn't move which ultimately resulted in a broken off screw. They are also too short. I had to use a block of wood to mount the camera far enough from the wall so the antenna wouldn't be hitting it.- The scheduling system is useless. Since I simply manually record 24/7 I ultimately decided not to bother with this system but what I did figure out was that you can set a single "on" and "off" event each day and the system would only recognize a setup if I switched it "on" first before switching it back "off". So setting it up to start recording on an evening and stop recording the next morning is for some reason not possible. If however you want it to record somewhere during daytime hours this system will do that.- When recording, none of the buttons on this thing work except the "manual record" button. This also means you can not turn the volume up or down while the system is recording. The volume switches also act as ":play/pause" and "stop" buttons while playing back videos which means that you also cannot change the volume during playback. The only time you can change the volume is during live view.- The screensaver function only works if the camera is idle. This means when manually recording, the screen is constantly on.Other:- You can choose low video quality (320x240) and high video quality (640x480). The low quality will record at about 3-4 frames per second with good sound quality and if you don't need to recognize faces at the other side of the street this is plenty good. The high quality will drop down to about 1-2 frames per second and I found it struggling to maintain a good connection with the sound intermittently being distorted.- When running continuously this system records 10 minute long files rather then one long one. Depending on contrast (less at night, more during day) the files turn out to be between 50 and 80 MB in size. The 16 GB card I installed will hold just about 2 days worth of continuous footage. I activated the option to overwrite the oldest file when the card is full so it acts like a continuous loop camera.- As mentioned by other reviewers the camera does require a power chord being plugged in while the DVR runs on internal batteries that can be charged on the charging cradle.There you have it.Ultimately I am satisfied with the result, but I would never recommend this system due to its many flaws.

Reviews.Title: Nice Features. Bad resolution
Reviews.Author: dan
Reviews.Content: So I hooked this up and it worked great and I was thrilled. Everything works as it should and the mic picks up clear as a bell. The night vision isn't bad either. The problem i noticed later is good luck actually identifying anyone, esp at night. Yes you will see someone key your car or break into your garage but you wont be able to tell who it was and neither will the police. If I remember right the high resolution setting is like 800x600 pixels. This is the yr 2014 right? My cell phone 20 years ago had higher resolution than that. The features are good but resolution is terrible.

Reviews.Title: Best Bang for your Buck
Reviews.Author: Chris Barnes
Reviews.Content: Display wasn't as high res as I was hoping but there is no doubt that this is the best buy for the money. The wireless cameras were easy to install and pair with the monitor and the fact that I can carry the monitor around the house is great.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Buy!
Reviews.Author: Tim Smallidge
Reviews.Content: System works as advertised. Daylight video and audio are fantastic. The included monitor works great. An absolute great system for the price!

Reviews.Title: Good product!
Reviews.Author: Renee
Reviews.Content: These camreas and moniter are exactly what we wanted and we are very happy with the quality!! They are good at night too! Thanks!

Reviews.Title: more than i tought
Reviews.Author: michael
Reviews.Content: When i ordered it the thing looked like just a camera system basic for the house. But when i received it I found a intercom system in each camera inferred night camera time movement recording and computer upload options GREAT deal for so cheap.

Reviews.Title: Problems after first week
Reviews.Author: Power to the People "Power to the People"
Reviews.Content: System was straightforward to set up and worked reasonably well for the price, but it is not reliable. Motion sensitivity is a bit flaky and inconsistent even regardless of sensitivity setting. A bird flying across the camera field of view will frequently initiate recording, while a car moving sometimes will NOT. Only one camera can record at a time. If one camera is tripped on by the wind moving a tree branch and that camera records, you will miss recording of a person walking in the view of the other camera at the same time. But the biggest complaint I have is the reliability. After almost two weeks, when used on with the higher resolution the monitor will sometimes (about 1/3 of the time) make a high pitch static sound that is very annoying and a line will develop across the view screen. After several tries I finally got through to Uniden support and they claim that is not normal and want me to send back (at my expense) the monitor to be repaired. They say it should "only" take 2-4 weeks! Meanwhile, of course, the cameras are worthless without the monitor. No replacement, prepaid mailer, etc. Nothing. If I had to consider buying this again, I probably would NOT.

Reviews.Title: Uniden America is rated "F" by the BBB!
Reviews.Author: DN
Reviews.Content: Uniden America is rated "F" (the worst possible) by the BBB Fort Worth / Texas. Details are:[...]One camera broke shortly after installation and it was impossible to get the camera back after repair from them. I called customer service several times and they are incapable of even reading the history in their computer. They do not react to E-mails or faxes or BBB complaints! Do not buy! If there is a problem you will not get help!

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Corvus "Maty"
Reviews.Content: We live in a mountain area, and needed a quick way to check what wildlife was in the back yard before we stepped out there as the windows don't give a full view. Camera does the job great, and also helps us keep an eye on the cat.  I'm viewing the back yard on the monitor as I'm writing this.The kit worked straight out of the box. The IR has limited range, and I've not tried auto-record.  Though we could not get it to work on a home PC monitor, setting up remote viewing on Skype was easy as ABC.

Reviews.Title: Garbage.
Reviews.Author: Jeff E.
Reviews.Content: The monitor turns off as soon as it's unplugged and I've had it charging all day. The motion detection is also broken on one camera and will start recording even pointed at a white wall.

Reviews.Title: A great security camera !
Reviews.Author: Howie
Reviews.Content: I am very very please with these cameras.  I had been using 2 cctv Ip wireless cameras for a couple of years and have always had connection problems, glitches etc. I was constantly rebooting, resetting the cameras. These Uniden cameras are rock solid , easy to install and have far greater range than my old cctv cameras.In addition, the two way intercom works amazingly well and is very sensitive.

Reviews.Title: Best I have seen for the $$
Reviews.Author: George Shaffer
Reviews.Content: I have two or three similar  little systems and I like this one the best...  One big problem with one of the older ones is that every time there is a power hiccup  the DVR has to be manually powered back on.  This unit with it's back up battery stays on.  I recommend powering the DVR and Cameras with a big battery backup  system anyway.

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: ND
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install. works great. clear picture day and night. works great. very happy. will buy 2 more cameras and all set.

Reviews.Title: Looks good lots of features
Reviews.Author: CRAIG W. SCHRIVER
Reviews.Content: I have yet to install the system. The weather has not been good and I have to coordinate my help. The headquarters is local and not in China if you need parts. I think it will be just what I need.

Reviews.Title: Not as advertised
Reviews.Author: Joy Farley
Reviews.Content: Did not record out to 4o', only recorded from side to side about 5', did not always pick up human movement.  I am returning this item.

Reviews.Title: just ok,
Reviews.Author: jonathan colina
Reviews.Content: is just ok , it work need new softwear so it work on your phone no on your Skype account, need more options , they good I guess is ok.,
